remarks: Membership in value of the partial isomorphism C is closed under vector sum.  (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2014.)
statement:
dicvaddcl.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
dicvaddcl.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
dicvaddcl.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dicvaddcl.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecH ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicvaddcl.i $e |- I = ( ( DIsoC ` K ) ` W ) $.
dicvaddcl.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` U ) $.
dicvaddcl $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( Q e. A /\ -. Q .<_ W ) /\ ( X e. ( I ` Q ) /\ Y e. ( I ` Q ) ) ) -> ( X .+ Y ) e. ( I ` Q ) ) $.
